title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning for Adolescent Literature-Based Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can read youth literature provided through a mobile platform within six months and summarize core content with 80% accuracy
After completing microlearning modules twice weekly, learners show over 75% participation in critical thinking questions (CTQs) linked to scientific topics
Self-efficacy scores increase by over 20% in pre-post comparison assessments at the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
